name: ORBiTOSS
description:
Orbitoss is a puzzle game based on reflex's and a little bit of dumb luck!, This game and all of its assets was created by Dillon Abotossaway within 3 days for a 72hr Game Jam hosted by 'Hellowpixl' and is also the first game I have completed! Please leave a comment and let me know what you think! Enjoy!

Controls

Space to Shoot, and to Reshoot during midflight

Left and Right Arrows to Change Directions of Orbit or to Slow down midflight

Q: to change Sound Levels
